Text: Great uploader..all in vain,comeon why don't you upload some other matches,Chelsea vs Swansea.
Sorry, but my possibilities are very limited (space in HDD, upload bandwidth etc). So, I do what I could in this circumstances.
Such a mean uploader, no-doubt you must be wearing Barca boxers/briefs either (:

@Ashleynin that's true, 
@Nepotu why do upload only one match each-day  (i.e. Barca) & save the excuse for us all xx
Nepotu you used to be a great uploader, who used to upload some extreme quality within limited size, not anymore.Everytime i look-up your torrents now..either we have Nba stuff or some Bracalona.
If you don't like Barca, look for other uploaders, sites, teams etc. And if I wear or not Barca boxers is not your f...g problem.

@Ashleynin & others: I started to upload a few years ago only Barca games for the Barca's fans, like me. Then I uploaded 2011 NBA playoffs and finals. Then someone ask me (nicely) to up Moto GP races, Then I thinked that will be nice (with this NBA lockout) to up NBA finals with those great players. I did something wrong? No need to excuse for that. But someones thinks that they have right to ask (command) anything. I don't need them. Only I need people who know to thank and ask nicely. If you don't like it, you can go to someone or somewhere else! It's a free world... That simple.

PS: By the way. What do you like to find in my torrents?
hey ignore this bastards Nepotu.you are doing a wonderful job by uploading barca matches. keep up the good work bro!!
@ush12357: Thank, bro! Thank you for your support!
